t: Amazon Launches Peak Velocity, Sportswear Brand - Business Insider
s: November 7, 2017 - Amazon has been quietly diving into the world of sportswear, a spokesperson confirmed with Business Insider. Its new sports-oriented clothing brand, Peak Velocity, which it launched in late October, offers performance sweatshirts and sweatpants with features like moisture-wicking and stretch.

t: Amazon launches 3 activewear brands - FashionNetwork USA
s: November 7, 2017 - Amazon is launching a direct attack on active brands Nike, Lululemon, Under Armour and Champion with the introduction of its three private label active brands: Goodsport, Rebel Canyon and Peak Velocity.
